games.name: Boom Blox
games.description: Started with the throwing Boom Blox games, and Married ended with a score 3,616 to Unmarried's 2,859. In the second round we played the attack games, and Unmarried beat Married 6-2. In the final battle it was a grab game, but our non-dominate hands! Unmarried pulled it out in the end with 161 vs Married's 100.

games.name: Dart
games.description: Played the best two out of three games of 301. Unmarried beat Married in the first and third games for the win.

games.name: Cubs Yahtzee
games.description: Married smashed their opponents with the final score of 263 vs Unmarried's 169.
